ai-tika-vin07t14:2_0: This is the ghee put for drinking, etc.
ai-tika-vin07t14:3_0: (2b) What is the reason why sentient beings, in common with what is not the origin of beings,
ai-tika-vin07t14:3_1: Through the meaning is that it is the meaning, having no debtermination, is the meaning.
ai-tika-vin07t14:3_3: All the gods have attained Worthiness on the path to Worthiness.
ai-tika-vin07t14:3_4: May they see the path be extinguished, may they be extinguished in order to realize extinguishment. (This is) suitable for attaining Nibbāna, which is pervaded by the gods.”
ai-tika-vin07t14:3_5: Herein, one should be extinguished there.
ai-tika-vin07t14:4_0: Thus there is the discussion on the Vinaya Commentary in the Discipline.
ai-tika-vin07t14:5_0: The exposition of the nuns’ disrepute is finished.
ai-tika-vin07t14:6_0: The account of the commentary on the nuns’ rules and their analysis is finished.
ai-tika-vin07t14:7_0: Reverence to him, the Fortunate One, the Worthy One, the Perfect Sambuddha
